sn46.2:2.1.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
sn46.2:2.1.en: And what fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

sn46.2:2.4.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
sn46.2:2.4.en: fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

sn46.2:3.1.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
sn46.2:3.1.en: And what fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

sn46.2:3.4.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
sn46.2:3.4.en: fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

sn46.2:4.1.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
sn46.2:4.1.en: And what fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when they have arisen, makes them increase and grow?

sn46.2:4.4.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
sn46.2:4.4.en: fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when they have arisen, makes them increase and grow.

sn46.2:5.1.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
sn46.2:5.1.en: And what fuels the arising of restlessness and remorse, or, when they have arisen, makes them increase and grow?

sn46.2:5.4.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
sn46.2:5.4.en: fuels the arising of restlessness and remorse, or, when they have arisen, makes them increase and grow.

sn46.2:6.1.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
sn46.2:6.1.en: And what fuels the arising of doubt, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

sn46.2:6.4.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
sn46.2:6.4.en: fuels the arising of doubt, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

sn46.2:9.1.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
sn46.2:9.1.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

sn46.2:9.4.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
sn46.2:9.4.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

sn46.2:10.1.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

sn46.2:10.4.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

sn46.2:11.1.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of energy, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

sn46.2:14.1.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of immersion, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

sn46.2:15.1.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of equanimity, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

sn46.2:15.4.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of equanimity, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.
